support.title: Support
support.contactDescription: For questions about our apps, bug reports, or feature requests, please feel free to contact us at the email address below.
support.responseTime: We typically respond within 2-3 business days.

about.title: About This Site
about.portalDescription: This site is a portal introducing applications developed by Harmonic Insight. Browse our various apps for Android, iOS, and Windows.
about.missionDescription: Our motto is "Making daily life and business more convenient and enjoyable through technology." We develop user-friendly and valuable applications.
about.statusPublic: Released: Officially published on app stores.
about.statusBeta: Beta: Available for testing via TestFlight or beta channels.
about.statusDev: In Development: Currently under development. Stay tuned!
